attributes.additional_details: Action park is great for the family getting your children away from their computers and engage in out door pursuits which encourages social interaction, team building,hand and eye coordination, physical excersize, overcoming fears and problem solving, we have lots of disability groups,schools, scouts,football teams and even essex fire and rescue use our tracks to test vehicles and train their staff, we have a alternative education centre for children who cannot stay in mainstream schools, we let local charity's and groups have free days at actionpark once a month we have people who have lost limbs and felt their life was over until action park opened they now ride motocross bikes like any other, we work with police from all local towns to help get illegal riders off of non permitted land and beaches, now the council want to close us down, after we have been there comming up 7 years, please join us and support us and let basildon council th action park is needed in this community!
